titleInfo.title: Letter: The "B" Club Promotes an Alumni v. Varsity Basketball Game in the New Gym

mods.abstract: "Have you seen your new De La Salle Gym? Open for inspection after the game!!! See the new roll-away bleachers! Locker rooms for Varsity, B team, and Freshman teams. First Aid Room. Finest high school athletic facilities in the City -- nothing equal to it in the 80 years of CBC histoy!"
